summary: A new standalone vanilla HTML/CSS/JS demo appears to have been added under frontend/standalone-gst-demo with index.html, style.css, and script.js, including developer-facing run instructions/comments. However, the diff also shows unrelated modifications to repo metadata/summary files describing extensive React app changes that were not requested for this BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Unrequested modifications to the existing React/Vite application and related frontend features (e.g., RBAC, dashboards, role management, invoice pages, inventory pages, audit log, GST returns page) as described in the modified frontend-file-summaries.txt.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest specifically asks to add a standalone vanilla UI in new files without impacting the existing React/Vite app; it does not request feature work or refactors in the React app.

hallucinated_features.description: Unrequested update to project_state.json describing new/existing features and summaries beyond adding the standalone demo.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not ask for project state/metadata updates.
